text: Ba#vaqtya~ggA#rA Eqva pra#tiqvEShTa#mAnA aqmitrA#NAmasyaq sEnAqM prati#vEShTayantiq ya uqnmAdyEqt tasmai# hOtaqvyA# gandharvAPsaqrasOq vA EqtamunmA#dayantiq ya uqnmAdya#tyEqtE Kaluq vai ga#ndharvAPsaqrasOq yadrA$ShTraqBRutaqstasmaiq svAhAq tAByaqH svAhEti# juhOtiq tEnaiqvainA$~jCamayatiq naiya#grOdhaq audu#mbaraq ASva#tthaqH plAkShaq itIqddhmO Ba#vatyEqtE vai ga#ndharvAPsaqrasA$M gRuqhAH sva EqvainA# - [  ]   25
